modName: Nord Male Follower - Jaime Hand of Death
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000] [/color][color=#ff0000][size=6]Jaime Hand Of [/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]Death[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]
[/size]
[/color][b] Nord Male Follower. Waiting for you in [color=#3d85c6]The[/color][color=#a64d79] [/color][color=#3d85c6]Bee And [/color][/b][b][color=#3d85c6]Barb, [/color][color=#a64d79]Riften[/color][/b][b][color=#a64d79]
[/color][/b]
[list]
[*][color=#a61c00][size=3][b][u]SKILLS[/u][/b][/size][/color]
[/list]

[color=#00ffff] 100 - Sneak
[b] 98 - Archery[/b][/color]

[list]
[*] [color=#9900ff][size=3][u]PERKS[/u][/size][/color]
[/list][color=#f1c232][size=2]

 Quick Shot,
 Agile Defender (Rank 4),
 Armsman (Rank 4),
 Dual Flurry (Rank 1),
 Light Foot, Stealth (Rank 4),
 Alteration Novice.[/size][/color]

[list]
[*][color=#ff00ff][size=3][u]SPELLS [/u][/size][/color]
[/list][color=#6d9eeb] Fast Healing, Oakflesh, Candlelight.[/color]
